scripts.build-transform-shared: node node_modules/token-transformer/cli tokens.json tokens/shared.json foundation,shared foundation
scripts.build-transform-light: node node_modules/token-transformer/cli tokens.json tokens/light.json foundation,light,light-component foundation
scripts.build-transform-dark: node node_modules/token-transformer/cli tokens.json tokens/dark.json foundation,dark,dark-component foundation
scripts.build-transform: pnpm run build-transform-shared && pnpm run build-transform-light && pnpm run build-transform-dark
